# Government Tender Announcement

## Request for Proposal (RFP)

### RFP Title
RFP for Inmate Transportation Services for the Correctional Service of Canada (CSC)

### RFP Reference
WS4326904840-Doc4339558806

### Amendment Information
Amendment 2 was released on February 6, 2024.

### Tender Details

* **Publication Date**: December 20, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: February 20, 2024 (amended from January 19, 2024)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: May 1, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: April 30, 2025

### Project Overview

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) requires the provision of air charter services with fixed-wing aircraft capable of carrying up to 110 passengers (Pacific Region) and 45 passengers (Atlantic Region) for inmate transfers by air.

### Scope of Work

The successful bidder will be responsible for providing air charter services to support CSC's inmate transfers by air, including the transportation of passengers and luggage.

### Evaluation Criteria

* **Lowest Price**

### Tender Documents

* The relevant tender documents can be accessed through the Ariba Discovery platform at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18335534?extsite=MTgzMzU1MzRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18335534?extsite=MTgzMzU1MzRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).
